From: "CYBERWOLF4" <cyberwolf4@...>


Lunarpine, Ice, and Razor Claw had returned to Veratis' ship with plenty of
stories to tell, and questions to ask. Ice had seen inside Megatons mind and
didn't like what she had found. She'd told the others about it on the way
back to Veratis' base. Razor Claw still believed in the legacy of Prime.
Even more now that he had met a bot claiming to be him.

Lunarpine was a just bot, he wasn't the type to judge based on a one sided
story that came from a Megalomaniac like Megaton. He was willing to give the
old bot the benefit of the doubt. He was still confused that the bot had
drugged him and then switched his body. Veratis had also given him back his
reason to function, Shadow Wing. (Now known as Ice.)

Thier transport came to a hault in what appeared to be an ice cave. In
reality it was one of many holds in Veratis' ship. The hatch opened and the
three stepped out. Veratis was recharging so it was Foxfingers who greeted
him. "Welcome back, it's good to see you again." the foxbot said in his
usual straight face. "I've set up energeon and drink in your quarters if
you'd like to rest." He stepped aside to allow the three weary travellers
passage to the hallway.

Lunarpine watched the smaller bot carefully as he passed. He remained in
telepathic contact with Ice the whole way. "Be carefull love, if Veratis
intentionally gave the two of you his virus theres no telling what else he's
willing to do." His thoughts betrayed him though, Ice knew that Lunarpine
didn't believe what he was saying. The old bot had injected her with the
virus to stabilize her transformation, it was only safe to assume that he'd
done the same for Razor Claw.
